titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Government's health insurance program for Federal employees include benefits relating to cleft lip, cleft palate, and certain other conditions.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/6/1987--Introduced. Provides that Federal health benefits plans may include benefits relating to cleft lip, cleft palate, and other congenital craniofacial anomalies.
